alert.note: Alert for McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:10PM CDT until July 01 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MCPHERSON AND NORTH CENTRAL HARVEY COUNTIES... At 510 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hesston, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Newton, Hesston, North Newton and Moundridge. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
